alert.note: Alert for Bracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, ROBERTSON AND CENTRAL BRACKEN COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Brooksville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, pea size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, Aberdeen, Lewisburg, Brooksville, Germantown, Sardis, Abigail, Murphysville, Moranburg, Stonewall, Mays Lick, Parina, Powersville, Peed, Fleming-Mason Airport, Lowell, Helena, Somo and Chatham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
